a.title: Physical and Health Education Power Standards

li.a: Physical and Health Education Power Standards

nav.div: Uinta County School District #4 » News » COVID-19 School Closure » School Closure

div.p: I listened to Governor Gordon’s press conference Thursday to hear the latest updates on his plans for our state moving forward after April 30th. What we heard from him and State Superintendent, Jillian Balow, is that some businesses may be allowed to reopen soon, but this did not include schools. Superintendent Balow did state that there may be an option for “special populations” in a “limited manner” to begin re-entry into school. The superintendents in the state will be meeting with Superintendent Balow early next week to discuss what that means exactly. We do know that any re-entry plan would require the approval of our Board of Trustees, our county health officer, the state health officer and the Wyoming Department of Education. Thanks for your perseverance. We will continue to communicate any changes when they develop.
